# loading-spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description           | Type      | Default  |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------- | --------- | -------- |
| `margin` | `margin`  | Set margin of spinner | `string`  | `'auto'` |
| `show`   | `show`    | Display the spinner   | `boolean` | `true`   |
